solvents.name: 0.5 M aqueous solution of pyrazine
solvents.amount: sufficient to fill the jar approximately 0.5 cm above the top of the vial

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: air dry for 1 day at room temperature, followed by heating at 423 K for dehydration
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The synthesis results in a mixture of yellow powder and needle crystals suitable for X-ray analysis.
